* Contact: <nowiki>[[BrianPitts]]</nowiki>
* Make: Compaq
* Brand: Presario
* Model: 2700
* Website: http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/product?lc=en&cc=us&product=95483

=== Current Issues ===
Cardbus cards do not work unless you boot with the kernel argument pci=assign-busses.
X does not automatically detect the proper 1400x1050 resolution, but it can be manually configured to use it.
Resuming from sleep does not restore the network connection.
Resuming from sleep brings up the log out menu.
Adjusting the headphone channel in Volume Control has no effect.

Direct Rendering can be enabled at full resolution by switching to the "radeon" driver and lowering the color depth to 16-bit.
